name: MINIMUM VIABLE RHYTHM GAME
description:
MOBILE CONTROLS:
1. Start audio (you may need to unmute your phone)
2. Place phone on forehead
3. Nod to the beat

If you hear boops, you're doing good  💅

If you hear bzzts, you're off beat or skipping beats 👀

If you have a VR headset, you can click the lil VR button in the bottom right corner to pop into the scene. Please ACTIVATE SOUND before starting the immersive experience.
